queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select distinct mos.contract , mos.ordernr , mp_LF.email as 'MailPurOrg' , mp_mgr.email as 'MailMatMan' , mp_purorg.email as 'MailLeadServ' -- TO BE UNCOMMENTED AFTER ACTIVATION, mcd.email as 'MailContractor' , 'jeroen.franssen@mil.be' as 'MailContractor' from mrqr_contracts mc inner join mrqr_contracts_years mcy on mc.contract=mcy.contract and mcy.year=year(now()) inner join mrqr_organisms mo_mgr on mc.manager=mo_mgr.organism inner join mrqr_persons mp_mgr on mp_mgr.idnr =mo_mgr.output_resp_idnr inner join mrqr_organisms mo_purorg on mc.pur_org=mo_purorg.organism inner join mrqr_persons mp_purorg on mp_purorg.idnr =mo_purorg.output_resp_idnr inner join mrqr_companies_details mcd on mc.COMPANY_DETAILS_ID=mcd.company_details_id inner join mrqr_contracts_years_imp mcyi on mc.contract=mcyi.contract inner join mrqr_dynamic_characteristics mdc on mdc.descriptor_value=mc.contract inner join mrqr_orders mos on mos.contract=mc.contract inner join mrqr_organisms mo_LF on mos.pur_org=mo_LF.organism inner join mrqr_persons mp_LF on mp_LF.idnr =mo_LF.output_resp_idnr inner join mrqr_dynamic_characteristics mdc2 on mdc2.descriptor_value=mos.pur_org where mos.status='A' and mc.status='A' and mcyi.year=year(now()) and mcyi.amount>0 and mdc.udt_table='CONTRACTS' and mdc.name='CON_EOB' and mdc.value='YES' and not(mos.contract is null) and mdc2.udt_table='ORGANISMS' and mdc2.name='ORG_EOB_YN' and mdc2.descriptor='org_code' and mdc2.value='YES'
AND mos.ordernr='pPORD'

select mom.reqno 'TopReqNo' , mom.nsn 'NSN' , mnp.pn 'PartNumber' , mn.description 'Descr' , mom.reqqty 'TopQty' , mom.store 'OrderStore' , mrl.child_reqno 'ChildReqNo' , mrn.qty 'ChildReqQty' , mrn.store 'ChildReqStore' , mr.remark 'ChildComments' from mrqr_orders mos inner join mrqr_orders_material mom on mos.ordernr=mom.ordernr inner join mrqr_nsn mn on mn.nsn=mom.nsn inner join mrqr_organisms mo_store on mom.store=mo_store.organism inner join mrqr_persons mp_store on mp_store.idnr =mo_store.output_resp_idnr inner join mrqr_dynamic_characteristics mdc on mdc.descriptor_value=mos.pur_org
left join mrqr_catalogue_items mci on mci.nsn=mom.nsn and mci.origin='PCOIN' and year(mci.reg_date)=year(now()) left join mrqr_nsn_pn_mfr mnp on mnp.nsn=mci.nsn and mnp.mfr=mci.supplier left join mrqr_requisitions_links mrl on mom.reqno=mrl.reqno left join mrqr_requisitions mr on mr.reqno=mrl.child_reqno left join mrqr_requisitions_nsn mrn on mrl.child_reqno=mrn.reqno and mrn.nsn=mom.nsn
where mos.status='A' AND mos.ordernr='pPORD' and not(mos.contract is null) and mdc.udt_table='ORGANISMS' and mdc.name='ORG_EOB_YN' and mdc.descriptor='org_code' and mdc.value='YES'
limit 2000
